ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Brawlers
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah your right. I made this mistake in mistmoore last night (i was pulling) , ok this is a bad idea. I cast root on a glyphed guard in the graveyard, but
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah your right.

I made this mistake in mistmoore last night (i was pulling) , ok this is a
bad idea. I cast root on a glyphed guard in the graveyard, but failed to see
the two casters behind it (my group handled it but i died almost as soon as i
got back to the group , pretty much jipping me of exp and losing some hard
earned exp in process..) Take my advice stick to healing buffing, besides you
get mobs on you enough just for the healing part ;)

Dungin
Level 24th (would be 25 if not for that lil mistake) cleric rathe
